channel.title: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward
channel.description: Hey, I've already portforward my router and the port is open. I've changed with Ip's to my ip but when I open the client up it just sticks to Connecting to server-1%. I must have gone wrong somewhere, doesn anyone know where I could have gone wrong?

item.title: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you use 127.0.0.1 and your friend uses the no-ip but if it is stuck at -1% something is wrong with the cache or you didn’t add the cache into the client/didn’t put it in your (C:) Drive

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward

item.title: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward
item.dc:creator: @Petergrayson Petergrayson
item.description:
@Petergrayson wrote:

Thanks alot What if I want to get on the server and so does my friends? Do I use no-ip?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward

item.title: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

if you are connecting to your own computer, you must use “127.0.0.1” in the client. it wont ever work by typing your IP address.

having your ip in the client will only work for other people who want to connect to you. Maybe this helps

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online. Already portforward
